body_html: @drpngx @cwhipkey Sorry for the late response. Unfortunately adding tensorflow/core/kernels:android_tensorflow_kernels doesn't solve my problem. I work around this missing kernel issue by manually adding all needed //tensorflow/core/kernels/*.cc *.h files to srcs. Maybe I was wrong about some details, but I will update if I solve it more elegantly.
